Title: Lost and Found
Text:
Following the conclusion of Fiamma at 9:00 PM two nights ago, some viewers found lost items within the theater and promptly reported them. The items are detailed as follows:

Blue Earring: Row 5, Seat 9, quantity: 1
Ministry of Development ID Card: Row 6, Seat 9, quantity: 1
Loong Buns Coupon (with special pattern): Row 8, Seat 10, quantity: 2
Handmade Headband (red and blue, partially braided): Row 16, Seat 11, quantity: 1

The owners of the above items are requested to claim them within a 10-day period from the date of this notice.
